page.title: 20AUTOBIOGRAPHY CONTINUED
page.content: and to North Africa.Returned to England to O.T.C. and was Commissioned. Posted to Burma and promoted to Captain,returning to U.K. in 1946.Worked in Photography then as Warehouse Manager with a paint firm then as Inventory Manager in cosmetics firm.Retired in 1982 and returned to Ashington. I have now settled and have a number of hobbies to keep me occupied. { {CREDITS {PUPIL CO-ORDINATERS Richard Allison Angus Davison John Picton Phillip Robertson {PUPIL RESEARCHERS History Workshop Activity Group {Number of Members_}15 {Local Historian:}Mr Fred Bennett {History Teacher:}Mrs Harper
